net.ant.rc.serial

Class SerialHardwareDetector

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.ant.rc.serial.SerialHardwareDetector

  • public class SerialHardwareDetector
extends java.lang.Object
    Detects robot on any comm port. Check it's type and init appropriate SerialDriver. Class holds all connection attributes, manage connects and disconnects.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ant
